movie.title: The Lego Movie
movie.writer: Phil Lord (screenplay), Christopher Miller (screenplay), Dan Hageman (story), Kevin Hageman (story), Phil Lord (story), Christopher Miller (story)
movie.actors: Will Arnett, Elizabeth Banks, Craig Berry, Alison Brie
movie.plot: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 60 wins & 53 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Boasting beautiful animation, a charming voice cast, laugh-a-minute gags, and a surprisingly thoughtful story, The Lego Movie is colorful fun for all ages.
